text: Kansas City is a 1996 French American crime drama movie directed by Robert Altman and starring Jennifer Jason Leigh, Miranda Richardson, Harry Belafonte, Michael Murphy, Steve Buscemi, Dermot Mulroney. It was distributed by Fine Line Features. ==Other websites== * Category:1996 crime drama movies Category:French crime movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Altman
title: Kansas City (1996 movie)
